meanings.definition: A person who is habitually untidy or careless in their personal appearance or habits.
meanings.sent1: The sloven left dirty dishes all over the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the neighborhood sloven because of her messy yard.
meanings.sent3: The sloven forgot to comb his hair before going to the party.
meanings.sent4: Her room looked like a tornado had hit it, truly a sloven's paradise.
meanings.sent5: The sloven's wrinkled clothes and unkempt hair made quite an impression at the job interview.

meanings.definition: To behave in a slovenly manner; to be untidy or careless.
meanings.sent1: Please don't sloven your room, keep it clean and organized.
meanings.sent2: He tends to sloven around the house on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to slovenly throw their toys all over the living room.
meanings.sent4: She watched as her grades began to sloven, slipping lower each week.
meanings.sent5: The leaves slovened down from the tree, creating a colorful carpet on the ground.
